glsa.title: ZNC:Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ZNC, the worst of which could result in privilege escalation.

background.p: ZNC is an advanced IRC bouncer.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ZNC. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could read arbitary files and esclate privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ZNC users should upgrade to the latest version:
